title: Vinton. Turn conversations into Salesforce data. Video + AI solutions native in Salesforce
content:
Vinton. Turn conversations into Salesforce data. Video + AI solutions native in SalesforceCatherine Nottage2024-12-05T17:33:18+00:00

Turn sales conversations into Salesforce data

Vinton is the meeting AI notetaker built exclusively for Salesforce.

Vinton works with

Why Vinton?

Work faster

Vinton saves tons of time with automated transcription, summary, tasks and emails from meetings, directly in Salesforce.

Work smarter

Vinton helps get Salesforce Orgs AI-ready. Crucial customer conversations and data go directly into Salesforce rather than a third-party silo.

Keep improving

Get AI-generated coaching based on the context and content of a call. See highlights and key moments, with suggestions for improvement. 

Get AI-ready

Automatically add rich, conversational data into Salesforce, laying the data foundation for AI success.

Trusted by

How Vinton works

Vinton is on mobile and desktop, ready to assist with every call and conversation.

Empowering teams to focus on the customer

Actively focus on conversations instead of notes and admin

40%

time saved on sales admin tasks

50%

increase in data accuracy

12x

ROI on time savings alone

100%

GPT-ready

Vinton’s a Winner at Salesforce Ben’s Productivity Demo Jam

Try Vinton for free. No installation.

We’ve made a home for Vinton where you can try it for free, with no need to install anything in your own Salesforce org.

It’s as simple as inviting Vinton to your next call.

Your data security is paramount

Certified for ISO/IEC 27001:2022

The information security management system for Vinton by Nativevideo’s AI-powered video and audio solutions has been assessed and certified for ISO/IEC 27001:2022, demonstrating our commitment to infosecurity across our business.

All metadata created by Vinton exists in Salesforce so is under the platform’s existing stringent security layer.

At no point in time do we have access to your recordings or notes. We do not hold any of the data that we process and make available on your behalf.

Media files are stored outside of your Salesforce Org in an AWS container with a direct, secure connection to only your Org.

Vinton uses OpenAI to generate the executive summaries, next step tasks and draft emails for your call and audio notes.

The recordings and notes captured by Vinton are not used to train generative AI models.

Vinton was designed to work with any LLM. If your Org prefers to use an alternative to OpenAI, Vinton can operate with your choice of LLM.

Built with amazing technologies

Get Vinton for free!

Are you a Salesforce Admin or do you influence what’s in your Org?

Head to the AppExchange and get Vinton now. Claim your five free licences to get your team started.

Our customers love Vinton

No more empty records, scant updates, bad forecasts. Vinton is the discreet Salesforce PA.

“Vinton has streamlined our daily workflow by handling time-consuming tasks like notetaking, which used to eat into our analysis time. Now, instead of spending hours capturing details, we can focus on interpreting the data and driving productive, purpose-oriented strategies. It’s been a game-changer in improving both our efficiency and the quality of our insights.”

Abegaile Joyce Bantugan

Dir of Tech & Innovation, My Mountain Mover

“Vinton by Nativevideo has transformed the way we manage meetings. With Vinton, our teams can focus on client interactions without the distraction of manual note-taking, leading to significant productivity gains and improved communication. Vinton’s capabilities have delivered an immediate ROI, making it an invaluable asset for our business.
I cannot recommend it highly enough.”

Ciaran McCullagh

COO, Vanguard Cloud Consulting

“In addition to great notetaking for our Zoom calls, Vinton does a great job in summarising the call. One of my favorite features is the automated “To’Do” list based on the conversation during the call. This is a reminder of each task that is promised and the responsible person. We also saving tremendous time by having Salesforce records updated with the call info. Great service as well!”

Terry Lydon

CEO, APPropoz Solutions

“Totally awesome mega productive app… A must have. Now my sales team can easily speak (yes, record audio with one click from any device) into Salesforce to capture information from their meetings. No more excuses that they forgot to log it to Salesforce! No more excuses for me either!”

Simon Thompson

CEO, Improved Apps

A quick intro to Vinton

From our blog

Want to meet Vinton?

Book time with for a virtual walk through or get Vinton through the AppExchange.

Together let’s turn conversations into Salesforce data and transform your meetings.
